Text saved: Based on what we have found, we recommend that Girox Foods should start using a management style that focuses more on its people. For example, we should look for ways to offer working hours that can be changed and think about how we can allow employees to work from the locations they choose. Managers need to find different ways to give our staff interesting tasks, and they should also provide more positive feedback and give praise for the work they do. If we spend more money on professional training, especially for social and communication skills, this could also help to create a positive environment where employees can do their best work.
